ygData.subject: RE: Ok I need advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Woo finally the politics of my server makes the list!! (Comments below) ... Since Martyr decided to steal the Dawnfire off Cazic Thule s corpse this has been a
ygData.messageBody:
Woo finally the politics of my server makes the list!! (Comments below)

>From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
>
> So my question is this... what do I do? I know in the
>future I'm not looting a thing and that we should have had more clear rules
>set up. Does this happen on other servers? Has this happened to any of
>you?


Since Martyr decided to steal the Dawnfire off Cazic Thule's corpse this has
been a big issue on our server.

It happened again in Fear the other night when one ranger looted some ranger
greaves even though he lost the lotto.

Because of these two incidents, those who would normally be completely
rational go a little overboard when someone doesn't do something as quick as
they expected it. Its truly sad that these two individuals have made it very
difficult to go on any planes run unless you join a power guild because of
loot stealing issues and its made people who are normally very nice into
people who trust no one and are looking for conspiracy at every turn.

I'm assuming that most decided that this theft never actually occurred
though because its not plastered all over the solusekro.org message boards
so I think you are in the clear.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 50 bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
